title: (Bug) Half screen after matches on Mac
body: After every game in the post game screen, the client loads in at the bottom of the screen showing only the top half of the client and I'm unable to move it and recenter it, and am forced to restart the game after every match. Is there a workaround / patch for this?

replies.body: Let's first try giving that client a quick repair by using the client options in the upper right hand corner, but if that doesn't help we can also look for the option called "close client during game" and make sure that is *not* checked. Make sure that option is turned off and let me know how that helps.
Yup, that fixed it , thanks a bunch.
I do have the "close client while in-game" option on. I'll turn it off and see if anything changes and will feedback, thanks.
